login.exploreWithoutAccount: Click here to take a look without an account!
login.checkSpam: If you have any issue, please check your spam folder!
login.mfaTokenEnter: Enter your token from your Authenticator application

editor.directMessageWarning: Admins of both your server and the external server can read these messages.
editor.unlistedWarning: Unlisted posts will get ignored by searches (TAGS INCLUDED), and will not show on explore local. but they will be shown to your followers. And if someone sends a link they will ve visible, unlike followers only. Basicaly, for when you want to post a lot but dont want to fill explore local.
editor.directMessageWithQuoteWarning: Quoted user will be notified of this as a mention too
editor.sensitivePlaceholder: What is sensitive about this woot?
editor.wootQuoteBoxLabel: Paste the URL of a woot to quote it. Can be the external url or the wafrn url
editor.mediaCountMastodonWarning: ATTENTION! ANY FURTHER MEDIA UPLOADED WILL NOT BE DISPLAYED ON MASTODON
editor.altTextWarning: Please fill in the media descriptions. If you want to disable this check, you can do so in the settings.
editor.editorGuide: Doubts on how to format the text or how to start? Check the guide

mfa.scanInstructions: Scan the code below in your Authenticator application, and enter the code shown
mfa.installInstructions: If you don't have an Authenticator app yet we suggest Aegis (Android) or 2FAS (iOS/Android)
mfa.secretFallback: If you cannot read the QR code you can use code '{{ secret }}' manually in your app
mfa.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this MFA provider? Note: deleting all MFA providers will disable MFA on your account
mfa.verifySuccess: Success, your MFA is now enabled
mfa.verifyFailed: Verification failed. Check your token, or if the problem persists ask an Administrator
mfa.errorMessageGeneric: There was an issue with your request. Try again, or ask an Administrator for help
mfa.noMfa: You do not have MFA enabled on your account
mfa.mfaList: You have the following MFA providers set up
